events.name: New Year's Eve Celebration 2026
events.description: Ring in 2026 with a spectacular celebration at The Forum! Live music, DJ sets, fireworks display at midnight.

events.name: January Sales Market
events.description: Post-holiday shopping with incredible deals from local vendors. First Saturday of the new year!

events.name: Winter Comedy Night
events.description: Beat the January blues with an evening of stand-up comedy featuring local and touring comedians.

events.name: Norwich Half Marathon 2026
events.description: 13.1 miles through historic Norwich. Valentine's Day run for all abilities. Register now!

events.name: Pancake Day Community Cook-Off
events.description: Free community event! Pancake cooking competition, toppings bar, and family fun activities.

events.name: Norwich Music Festival
events.description: A celebration of local music talent featuring performances from Norwich's best artists. Join us for an evening of live music across multiple stages.

events.name: Norwich Night Market
events.description: Evening market with local vendors, food stalls, and live entertainment. Perfect for a summer evening out.

events.name: Norwich Arts Centre Live
events.description: An evening of live performances featuring local and touring artists. Intimate venue, great acoustics.

events.name: Community Garden Workshop
events.description: Learn sustainable gardening techniques and connect with your community. Free event, all welcome.

events.name: Norwich City FC Match
events.description: Watch Norwich City FC take on their rivals in this exciting home match.

events.name: Theatre Royal: Local Production
events.description: A stunning local production showcasing Norwich's theatrical talent. Limited run, book early.

events.name: Norwich Food & Drink Festival
events.description: Free entry food and drink festival featuring local producers, street food, and live music.

events.name: Late Night Club Night
events.description: Dance the night away with top DJs and live performances. 18+ event.

events.name: St. Patrick's Day Parade & Festival
events.description: Celebrate St. Patrick's Day with a parade, Irish music, food stalls, and family activities. Free entry.

events.name: Spring Jazz Night
events.description: An evening of smooth jazz featuring the Norwich Jazz Collective and special guests.

events.name: Earth Day Beach Clean-Up
events.description: Join us for an Earth Day beach clean-up! Equipment provided. Refreshments afterwards.

events.name: Norwich Craft Beer Festival
events.description: Sample over 100 craft beers from local and international breweries. 18+ event.

events.name: Shakespeare in the Park
events.description: Outdoor theatrical performance of A Midsummer Night's Dream. Bring a picnic and blanket!

events.name: Norwich Pride 2026
events.description: Annual Pride celebration with parade, live music, performances, and community stalls. All welcome!

events.name: Electric Warehouse Rave
events.description: Underground techno and house music event. International DJs. 18+ ID required.

events.name: Norwich Film Festival
events.description: Week-long film festival showcasing independent and international cinema. Multiple screenings daily.

events.name: Autumn Farmers Market
events.description: Fresh local produce, artisan goods, and seasonal treats. Support local farmers and makers.

events.name: Halloween Ghost Walk
events.description: Spooky guided tour through historic Norwich. Hear tales of ghosts and legends. Family-friendly.

events.name: Bonfire Night Spectacular
events.description: Fireworks display, bonfire, food stalls, and family entertainment. Free entry, donations welcome.

events.name: Norwich Christmas Market
events.description: Traditional Christmas market with festive gifts, food, and entertainment. Runs through December.
